author: nftdao
title: Cardano Subnet/VM Avalanche Bridge
description: No Cardano Subnet/VM on Avalanche prevents teams launching Cardano instances for DeFi dApps, like competing EVMs—impelling interoperability.
solution: Architect and build a Cardano Subnet/VM on Avalanche enabling DeFi bridges between the Cardano network and the Cardano Subnet on Avalanche.
experience:
Chief Architect - Gabriel Cardona, Senior Developer, AvaLabs
Development Team - CTO, 3 developers, 1 project manager
